lead_paragraph: The Giants waived the backup quarterback Jared Lorenzen, a little more than a month before the opening of training camp. Lorenzen’s status has been a question mark since the Giants signed the veteran David Carr as a free agent and drafted Andre Woodson, who, like Lorenzen, played at Kentucky. With Eli Manning and Anthony Wright also on the roster, the move left the Giants with five quarterbacks.
